(BUSY) At a meeting. Be back at some point.

msg: Yes, Aida. She’s definitely an AI. I don’t have any solid evidence, of course, but she just suddenly showed up and has been working here ever since. I don’t think she’s actually a button masher like the rest of us though. I think Delores gives her secret commands or something. Again, I don’t exactly have any solid evidence to back this up but just talk to her yourself and you’ll see what I mean.

sequence.msg: You should talk to her if you haven’t already. She’s living in the uncanny valley, if you get my drift.

Some of us who have been here longer make more- I know that much. Though Jude… There’s something suspicious there because he bought his own yacht last year. Apparently he lives in some fancy penthouse downtown as well. There’s no way he could bring in enough money on even a senior button masher salary. I wouldn’t be surprised if Delores is playing favorites.

I have been saying for years that there’s something afoot here but everyone just dismisses me as a conspiracy theorist. What company hires people to push a button? For that matter, what company controls their nuclear reactor’s cooling system by having humans push a button? It just doesn’t make sense. Then there’s the Mysterious Person but… nevermind. Forget I said anything.
